How many people are affected by CHARGE syndrome ?,"CHARGE syndrome occurs in approximately 1 in 8,500 to 10,000 individuals.",GHR,CHARGE syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to CHARGE syndrome ?,"Mutations in the CHD7 gene cause more than half of all cases of CHARGE syndrome. The CHD7 gene provides instructions for making a protein that most likely regulates gene activity (expression) by a process known as chromatin remodeling. Chromatin is
